body: The cogs of her mind began turning, and then, as she picked the dead skin off of her thumb, it seemed that there was a moment where she realized. This was my way out. This was my free pass. My kind no. I had sacrificed getting closure on the strange way that her mind had come to the conclusion it did, but she would never know what exactly I thought about her last great attempt.
She slicked back her hair, some foundation sneaking into the roots of her hair as she did so. "Okay,” She said, "Let’s look at <CHOICE(0)>

options.true: "Yeah. I’ve got to see my girlfriend soon anyway," At that, her face turned bright red.
